ComicInfo.Title: The Eyes of the Tiger; Dead Man's Tale; The Man-Eating Lizards; Mystery of Murder Manor; The Strange Case of Henpecked Harry
ComicInfo.Summary:
Carl Cattler's pet tiger gets his first taste for blood.
Myron Morgan's ghost tells of the bottle that gave him wealth and how he died when it was destroyed.
When a plane goes down in the ocean, the surviving crew members find themselves on an island of giant, man-eating lizards.
Goofy is given a new assignment, but it appears to already be haunted.
Johnny and Rupert Rawlings take refuge in a supposedly haunted house, but find the truth behind the tales.
Harry Horton plots the death of his wife, but the guilt drives him mad.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Fujitani,Jon Small,Joe Kubert,Fred Kida,Bob Fujitani,Jon Small,Joe Kubert,Fred Kida
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Fujitani,George Roussos,Joe Kubert,Fred Kida,Bob Fujitani,George Roussos,Joe Kubert,Fred Kida
